name: Sunbeam GI-1 3.5 g Thermal Paste
Features: [The Sunbeamtech Glacius Thermal Grease improves the efficiency of your cooling system., It can easily be cleaned from CPUs and heatsinks and it will not leave a sticky residue on your hands.Both non-toxic and non-conductive., Appearance: Grey, Viscosity: 340000 cP, Thermal conductivity: 3.20 W/mK, Operating temperature: -45 degree C ~ 150 degree C, Volume: 1ml (3.5g)]
